About US
Company name: Dongguan Xintai Instrument Co.,Ltd
Company address：Building16, No.3 Yongtai Road, TangxiaTown,Dongguan City,Guangdong,China., 523710
MissionHti aim to provide our customers with unique and innovative products that would enrich their home and lifestyle. With a variety of consumer electronics and digital measuring instruments, we are constantly looking to expand and improve our product lines to meet the needs of customers who want to live a modern and environmentally friendly lifestyle. Our Story
We own two major brands "Xintest" and "HTI".that workshop area is more than 10000 square meters .
Company has a strong R&D and Sales team. At present, the average working experience of nearly 40 R & D personnel is more than 8 years. There are 5 professional foreign trade sales teams total 50 people. What’s more,company has more than 40 invention patents and team members won the first place in many sales competitions.
Hti was established in June 2009. And professional manufacturer of instruments, such as IR thermometers, Anemometers, Sound Level Meters, Humidity and Temperature Meters, Carbon monoxide meter,Microwave leakage detector etc. We provide one-stop services, from conceptual design to prototyping to mass production. Our rich experience in design and manufacturing technologies enable us to meet our customers' ODM and OEM requirements.and have a good reputatio... With a growing reputation, Hti has developed partnerships with giant online retailers such as Amazon, eBay, Walmart and Alibaba over the years. Thermal TechnologyOur most popular product line is the Thermal Imaging Cameras. The demand of thermal camera has been increasing rapidly over the past decade or so. Back then, most thermal cameras would cost upwards of thousands of dollars, making it nearly impossible for regular homeowners to have access to one. In recent years, more affordable cameras have been developed and Hti tapped into this market and is currently one of the leading players in this industry. We have engineers in this area more than 18 years with a wealth of experience. So We can work closely to our customers and market. Many new products were presented per year to make our products to be rich variety . Core ValuesCustomer Satisfaction: We always make sure our customers enjoy the best possible experience with us through top notch customer service, high quality products and by catering to our customers’ needs. Innovation: As the world of technology is constantly evolving at an extremely fast pace, we always look for ways to improve our products and create new products that meets the need of our customers. Future Plans2020 is going to be a big year for Hti. Our research and development team have put in a lot of time and effort into a new and exciting project that could be life changing to many people.
